description:
Togame is the daughter of http://anidb.net/ch14930 [Hida Takahito]. The shougun has ordered her to collect the 12 finals swords created by master swordsmith http://anidb.net/ch25103 [Shikizaki Kiki]. She teams up with http://anidb.net/ch13122 [Yasuri Shichika] on her search for the swords.
Due to her father`s rebellion against the shogunate 20 years in the past she has to hide her identity and real name. Her original name is Yousha-hime. It is due to witnessing her father`s death at the hands of http://anidb.net/ch14931 [Yasuri Mutsue] that her hair has turned white.
name: Togame
